Install

pip install fastagger

How to use

Import some pdf image pages to destiny folder

{% raw %} 
APP_ROOT = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath('__file__'))
p = Pdf(APP_ROOT+'/resources/pdfs/01.pdf')
{% endraw %}
